attributes.action: NOT RESIGN - I do not want Mr Brown to resign as I think he is a good man and he is doing a good job for the Country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not want Gordon Brown to resign - I think he is doing a good job under difficult circumstances. He is a caring man who wants to do his best for the country and for the British people. Please let him get on with his job and please stick together in the Labour party - the alternative is scary!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
